ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.10 Steps to reproduce the problem: 1. Go to product details page in admin area and upload a picture containing just white (#ffffff) background 2. Use any color picker to see that it is now #fffcff instead of #ffffff More details at ticket 14874 (our premium support portal) Also see related https://github.com/SixLabors/ImageSharp/issues/355 and https://github.com/SixLabors/ImageSharp/issues/502
